text: @GregAbbott_TX Did you see the alarming number of reported COVID-19 cases in Texas today, greg? Oh, it’s obvious you don’t give a shit about endangering people’s lives. Your goal is to please your ignorant orange master Crooked tRump. You’re an embarrassment.
